output.conclusion: By completing this course, you'll be equipped with the knowledge and strategies to implement Product-Led Growth in your organization, driving sustainable growth and customer satisfaction.
output.introduction: Welcome to the Product-Led Growth course! This course is designed for intermediate-level professionals looking to deepen their understanding and implementation of PLG strategies. We'll cover key concepts, frameworks, and practical examples to help you drive growth through your product.

chapters.description: Explore the core components of the PLG flywheel: Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, and Revenue. Learn how each stage contributes to sustainable growth.
Discover how to pinpoint the moment users experience the core value of your product and how to optimize for it.
Learn about key performance indicators (KPIs) for PLG, such as product qualified leads (PQLs), time to value (TTV), and customer lifetime value (CLTV).

chapters.chapterTitle: Freemium vs. Free Trial: Which is Right for You?
chapters.description: Compare and contrast freemium and free trial models, considering factors like product complexity, target audience, and monetization strategy.
Learn how to create engaging and intuitive onboarding flows that guide users to value quickly and efficiently.
Explore the use of in-product messaging, tooltips, and contextual help to guide users and drive feature adoption.

chapters.chapterTitle: Analyzing User Behavior with Product Analytics
chapters.description: Learn how to use product analytics tools to understand user behavior, identify pain points, and optimize the user experience.

chapters.chapterTitle: Implementing Feedback Loops for Continuous Improvement
chapters.description: Discover how to collect and analyze user feedback to iterate on your product and improve user satisfaction.
Explore how to personalize the user experience based on user segments and behavior to increase engagement and retention.

chapters.chapterTitle: Building a Referral Program that Works
chapters.description: Learn how to design a referral program that incentivizes users to spread the word about your product.

chapters.chapterTitle: Leveraging Social Proof and User Testimonials
chapters.description: Explore how to use social proof and user testimonials to build trust and credibility.
Discover how to create content and experiences that users will want to share with their networks.

chapters.chapterTitle: Optimizing Pricing and Packaging for PLG
chapters.description: Learn how to design pricing and packaging that aligns with your product's value proposition and target audience.

chapters.chapterTitle: Driving Upsells and Cross-sells Through the Product
chapters.description: Explore how to use the product to drive upsells and cross-sells to increase revenue.
Discover how to track and optimize key revenue metrics, such as conversion rates, average revenue per user (ARPU), and customer lifetime value (CLTV).
